query.oql: select distinct a.year, a.name as n1, b.name as n2 from authors a, authors b where a.year = b.year and a.name != b.name
query.qrawl: select distinct a.year, a.name as n1, b.name as n2 from authors a, authors b where a.year = b.year and a.name != b.name

query.oql: select distinct a.year, a.name as n1, b.name as n2 from authors a, authors b where a.year = b.year and a.name != b.name and a.name < b.name
query.qrawl: select distinct a.year, a.name as n1, b.name as n2 from authors a, authors b where a.year = b.year and a.name != b.name and a.name < b.name

query.oql: select distinct a.year, struct(name:a.name, title:a.title) as p1, struct(name:b.name, title:b.title) as p2 from authors a, authors b where a.year = b.year and a.name != b.name and a.name < b.name
query.qrawl: select distinct a.year, (name:a.name, title:a.title) as p1, (name:b.name, title:b.title) as p2 from authors a, authors b where a.year = b.year and a.name != b.name and a.name < b.name

query.oql: select P as publication, (select A from P.authors a, authors A where A.name = a and A.title = "professor") as profs from publications P
query.qrawl: select P as publication, (select A from P.authors a, authors A where A.name = a and A.title = "professor") as profs from publications P

query.oql: select article: P, (select A from P.authors a, authors A where A.name = a and A.title = "professor") as profs from publications P where "particle detectors" in P.controlledterms
query.qrawl: select article: P, (select A from P.authors a, authors A where A.name = a and A.title = "professor") as profs from publications P where "particle detectors" in P.controlledterms
